ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all Ive been using duel wield and double attcak for a week or so because of lack of funds (I seem to be spending it all on booze and broad s in Halas).. I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all Ive been using duel wield and double attcak for a week or so because
of lack of funds (I seem to be spending it all on booze and broad's in
Halas).. I use a Mino Axe and a FS-longsword Ive been using the sword in my
right hand with good results yesterday I died and when I got my stuff back
the sword defalted to the left hand and the axe to the right so I decided to
try it like that WOW what a Differance I hit harder with my Right and faster
with my left now it is taking 25% LESS time to kill the same stuff as
before....Try it and let me know if it works for you.....Lilabn Lvl 16
Warrior
